title: T 202 "Lord catches His Man" Featuring Joe Jackson SOLD
author: TUM301

posts.post_title: T 202 "Lord catches His Man" Featuring Joe Jackson SOLD
posts.post_content:
Offered here is an often discussed card that doesn`t seem to come up very much lately. Thanx to one of our very own members,  most collectors believe that this particular 202 depicts the one and only Joe Jackson. The enclosed scans show a nice presentable front and a back with some paper loss. Feel free to ask any questions via PM/email/board posting. Asking 425.00 dollars Paypal net to me. Ins/Priority Mail shipping, 20.00. 1`st "I`ll take it" is the new owner. Thanx for looking....Murph
[url=https://flic.kr/p/2jvEYDr][img]https://live.staticflickr.com/65535/50218897563_6d3df18251_c.jpg[/img][/url][url=https://flic.kr/p/2jvEYDr]T202`s, Lord Catches Man...Scharfer Play At First[/url] by [url=https://www.flickr.com/photos/154296763@N05/]Hugh Murphy[/url], on Flickr
[url=https://flic.kr/p/2jDwqZY][img]https://live.staticflickr.com/65535/50307762178_b9de0350ff_b.jpg[/img][/url][url=https://flic.kr/p/2jDwqZY]Untitled[/url] by [url=https://www.flickr.com/photos/154296763@N05/]Hugh Murphy[/url], on Flickr
Took this down some to 425.00 plus shipping. Thanks for looking.
Lowered to 400.00 dollars shipped, thanx for looking.
